verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, pose \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w*; \w speak|strong="H4911"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*

\w and|strong="H1419"\w* tell \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H1419"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3541"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* \w with|strong="H5404"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w long|strong="H1419"\w* pinions,\f + \fr 17:3 \ft Pinions are the outer parts of a bird’s wings, including the flight feathers.\f* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* \w of|strong="H4392"\w* \w feathers|strong="H5133"\w* \w of|strong="H4392"\w* \w many|strong="H7553"\w* \w colors|strong="H7553"\w*, came \w to|strong="H3947"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w top|strong="H6788"\w* \w of|strong="H4392"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* cedar.

\w He|strong="H7760"\w* \w plucked|strong="H6998"\w* \w off|strong="H6998"\w* \w its|strong="H7760"\w* \w topmost|strong="H7218"\w* \w shoot|strong="H3242"\w*, carried \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* land \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* planted \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w traders|strong="H7402"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w some|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w planted|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w fertile|strong="H2233"\w* \w soil|strong="H7704"\w*;\f + \fr 17:5 \ft Hebrew in a field of seed\f* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w abundant|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w willow|strong="H6851"\w*.

\w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w sprouted|strong="H6779"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spreading|strong="H5628"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, \w low|strong="H8217"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w toward|strong="H6437"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*; \w yet|strong="H7971"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* \w remained|strong="H1961"\w* \w where|strong="H8478"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w stood|strong="H6967"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w yielded|strong="H6213"\w* \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* shoots.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H3671"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w feathers|strong="H5133"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w bent|strong="H3719"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w planting|strong="H4302"\w* \w bed|strong="H6170"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* might \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w soil|strong="H7704"\w* \w by|strong="H4325"\w* \w abundant|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* order \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w yield|strong="H6213"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w splendid|strong="H2896"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Will|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* flourish? \w Will|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* uprooted \w and|strong="H1419"\w* stripped \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w so|strong="H3541"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* shrivels? \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w foliage|strong="H6529"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*! \w It|strong="H5375"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H1419"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w pull|strong="H5423"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w*.

\w Even|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* transplanted, \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* flourish? \w Will|strong="H7307"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w completely|strong="H3001"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w* \w when|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w strikes|strong="H5060"\w*? \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H6170"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* sprouted.’” The Parable Explained

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* say \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w this|strong="H3947"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: ‘\w Do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* mean?’ \w Tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*, ‘\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w carried|strong="H3947"\w* \w off|strong="H4428"\w* \w its|strong="H3045"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w back|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3389"\w* Babylon.

\w He|strong="H1285"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* member \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w royal|strong="H4410"\w* \w family|strong="H2233"\w* \f + \fr 17:13 \ft Hebrew the royal seed\f* \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*, putting \w him|strong="H3947"\w* under oath. \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H1285"\w* \w carried|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* leading \w men|strong="H3772"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* land,

\w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* would \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w low|strong="H8217"\w*, unable \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* itself \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, surviving only \w by|strong="H5975"\w* \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* king \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H4714"\w* Babylon \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w envoys|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* ask \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w large|strong="H7227"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Will|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* flourish? \w Will|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H7227"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*? \w Can|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w break|strong="H6565"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w yet|strong="H5414"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*?’

‘\w As|strong="H4427"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w as|strong="H4427"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*,’ \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, ‘\w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* enthroned \w him|strong="H4427"\w*, whose oath \w he|strong="H3808"\w* despised \w and|strong="H4428"\w* whose \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w broke|strong="H6565"\w*.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w vast|strong="H1419"\w* \w horde|strong="H6951"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w help|strong="H4421"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w ramps|strong="H5550"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w siege|strong="H5550"\w* \w walls|strong="H1785"\w* \w constructed|strong="H1129"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* despised \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oath \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w breaking|strong="H6565"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*. Seeing \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* pledge \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*!’

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* oath \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* despised \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* broke.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H8033"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w catch|strong="H8610"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w snare|strong="H4686"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H8033"\w* bring \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Babylon \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w execute|strong="H8199"\w* \w judgment|strong="H8199"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* treason \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* choice troops \f + \fr 17:21 \ft Many Hebrew manuscripts; MT All his fleeing troops\f* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w survive|strong="H7604"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6566"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.’
